title: Beef caldo with spinach
ingredients: ['vegetable oil for browning', '500g (1 1/4 lb) beef topside joint, diced', '1 medium onion, diced', '6 plum tomatoes, chopped', '4 new potatoes, quartered', '1 (700g) jar passata', '1 (200g) bag fresh spinach, torn into bite-size pieces', '120ml (4 fl oz) red wine', '3 cloves garlic, minced', 'handful chopped fresh oregano', '1 (500g) tub Joubere Organic Beef Stock']
